title: Golden Horde
summary: The Golden Horde, self-designated as Ulug Ulus, lit. 'Great State' in Turkic,[8] was originally a Mongol and later Turkicized khanate established in the 13th century and originating as the northwestern sector of the Mongol Empire.[9] With the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire after 1259 it became a functionally separate khanate. It is also known as the Kipchak Khanate or as the Ulus of Jochi.[10]
